`)}})}function f1(t){return i.data.find(d=>d.name===t).code.toUpperCase()}async function p1(){w.value=!1,h.value=null,Z.value=!1,y.value=null,Y()}const C1=F(()=>{var t,a,d,_;return(t=o.data)!=null&&t.currency?W1((d=(a=o.data)==null?void 0:a.billing_info)==null?void 0:d.micro_debit_charge_amount,(_=o.data)==null?void 0:_.currency):0});return(t,a)=>(f(),p("div",c3,[w.value?z("",!0):(f(),p("div",f3,[g(L(H1),{class:"h-5 w-5 text-gray-700"})])),s("div",{class:o1({"opacity-0":!w.value})},[R(s("div",null,[s("label",p3,[a[3]||(a[3]=s("span",{class:"block text-xs text-gray-600"}," Credit or Debit Card ",-1)),s("div",{class:"form-input mt-2 block h-[unset] w-full py-2 pl-3",ref_key:"cardElementRef",ref:U},null,512),g(L(K),{class:"mt-1",message:I.value},null,8,["message"])]),g(L(D),{class:"mt-4",label:"Name on Card",type:"text",modelValue:n.cardHolderName,"onUpdate:modelValue":a[0]||(a[0]=d=>n.cardHolderName=d)},null,8,["modelValue"]),g(a3,{ref_key:"addressFormRef",ref:J,class:"mt-5",modelValue:n,"onUpdate:modelValue":a[1]||(a[1]=d=>n=d),onSuccess:a[2]||(a[2]=d=>console.log("Address form submitted"))},null,8,["modelValue"])],512),[[q,!S.value]]),R(s("div",C3,[s("p",m3,[a[4]||(a[4]=E(" We are attempting to charge your card with ")),s("strong",null,v1(C1.value),1),a[5]||(a[5]=E(" to make sure the card works.
